Spartan Path.description: The Spartan Path represents the warrior's journey - building strength through structured discipline, consistent effort, and embracing discomfort as growth. This path values resilience, routine, and the power of pushing boundaries.

Wellness Graph.description: The Wellness Graph represents the healer's journey - tracking progress through self-awareness, gentle consistency, and emotional intelligence. This path values sustainable growth, mental health, and the power of small, measured steps.

comparison.title: Spartan Path vs Wellness Graph
comparison.subtitle: Two approaches, one destination: lasting strength
comparison.description: NightChill recognizes that everyone's journey is different. The Spartan Path embraces the dirty boxer mentality - getting in the ring, taking hits, and building armor through discipline. The Wellness Graph honors the analytical fighter - studying patterns, measuring growth, and building strength through understanding. Both are valid. Both lead to belonging.
comparison.dirtyBoxerPhilosophy: The 'dirty boxer' isn't about fighting dirty - it's about getting in the ring when you're not perfect, showing up with your scars, and building strength through real struggle. Whether you're a Spartan warrior or a Wellness analyst, you're a dirty boxer if you keep showing up.
comparison.synergy: Many users find strength in both paths - using Spartan discipline on good days and Wellness flexibility on tough days. NightChill's tagging system lets you find the right support for where you are right now.

unifiedDirtyBoxerTags.description: Tags that apply to entities supporting both paths

application.gyms: Any gym partner displaying these values
application.maps: Any location tagged with these attributes
